name: LEARN_ASSESS_INFO
description: This table contains the basic no-add single items of Learning Assessment template/topic (ILA) records like record name, state, type, level, no-add items edited and instant of their edit, etc.

columns.name: ILA_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the template/topic record.

columns.name: ILA_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name for this Learning Assessment Template/Topic record.

columns.name: ILA_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the learning assessment record.
